description:
On KeyPair duplication attempt CreateKeyPair requests must return with the " InvalidKeyPair.Duplicate" error code instead of the 'KeyPairExists' according to the http://docs.amazonwebservices.com/AWSEC2/latest/APIReference/api-error-codes.html.

Note: The doc does not specifies exactly the which code to use from the 400-series . I guess 409 can be used here.

Test System version:  openstack-nova-api-2012.2-1.fc18
title: Incorrect EC2 error code (CreateKeyPair) Duplicate

comments.content:
On KeyPair duplication attempt CreateKeyPair requests must return with the " InvalidKeyPair.Duplicate" error code instead of the 'KeyPairExists' according to the http://docs.amazonwebservices.com/AWSEC2/latest/APIReference/api-error-codes.html.

Note: The doc does not specifies exactly the which code to use from the 400-series . I guess 409 can be used here.

Test System version:  openstack-nova-api-2012.2-1.fc18
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~afazekas

comments.content:
The error code issues are more general than I expected:
https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/ec2-error-codes
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~afazekas
